Text:
Such a shame this show was cancelled.
at the moment there is a online petition for getting Firefly back in production.
http://www.youchoose.net/campaign/return_firefly_and_serenity

Thanks a lot for this one!
The best series in a long long time, no doubt.

What about seeding after youi downloaded this guys!!!!!!
*always this problem about seeding good series and torrents like this!*

If you liked this serie, please join the petition to bring the serie back!

Om du gillade denna serie, skriv gärna på namninsamligen för att få serien tillbaka!

http://www.youchoose.net/campaign/return_firefly_and_serenity#campaignnodetab
